main event: A civilian observed a reddish-silver circular object in the sky over Roscoe, New York on September 4, 1966.
interesting points: The object was about half the size of a small airplane,The observer described the object as emitting a bluish-greenish trail,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 seconds and took place at 2330Z,The object was first observed at an angle of 60 degrees in the northeast and disappeared behind clouds,The observer is noted as a reliable individual with a background as a welder.
